metadata.description: Professor X continues to train his young students that he has called them the X-men. They are mutants born with abilities that set them apart from normal humans. The X-men are Cyclops (Scott Summers), Beast (Hank McCoy), Iceman (Bobby Drake), and Angel (Warren Worthington III).  The Xavier Institute for Higher Learning gains a new student Jean Grey who will be called Marvel Girl.
metadata.name: Uncanny X-Men
